alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Meagher, southern Judith Basin and southeastern Cascade Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of White Sulphur Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stanford, Neihart, Sapphire Village, Windham and Utica. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 33 and 45. Highway 12 between mile markers 53 and 54. Highway 89 between mile markers 11 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central Montana.
